content: d short-sleeves 2 2 75 2 75 3 25 /5 7 7 8 cm long-sleeves 5 75 6 25 6 75 7 25 /14 5 16 17 18 cm www elizabethsmithknits com 4 pattern techniques & tips techniques visit elizabethsmithknits com/coffeebeantips for knitted-on cast-on insert rn into stitch on ln tutorials on all of these techniques and more just as you would to knit it then wrap yarn around the rn and work just as you would to knit a stitch long tail cast-on refer to my video tutorial on but when you pull the loop through place it on my tips page link above the ln switching colors every 2 row refer to my working your sleeves with dpns or the magic video tutorial on my tips page link above loop method refer to my tips page m1-r make 1 - right leaning with ln pick up pick-up and knit for front bands refer to my strand in between ln and rn from back to front video tutorial on my tips page knit into front of this st with rn -1 st increase d yo yarn-over bring yarn from back of work to m1-l make 1 - left leaning with ln pick up front in-between needle tips then bring it over strand in between ln and rn from front to back the top of the rn to the back of the work ready to knit into back of this st with rn - 1 st increase d work next stitch - 1 st increase d attaching buttons refer to my tutorial on my k2tog knit 2 together knit the next 2 sts tips page together - 1 st decrease d ssk slip slip knit slip the next 2 sts one at a time as if to knit from ln to rn then insert ln into the fronts of these 2 sts and knit them together - 1 st decrease d abbreviations approx = approximately bobble = bind off bor = beginning of round circ = circular cc = contrasting color co = cast on circ = circular decrease d = decrease d dpn = double pointed needle increase d = increase d k = knit ln = left needle mc = main color meas = measures p = purl pm = place marker repeat = repeat rn = right needle round s = round s rs = right side sm = slip marker st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st ws = wrong side yo = yarn-over interested in a matching hat check out this page for the free pattern download elizabethsmithknits com/product/little-coffee-bean-baby-hat www elizabethsmithknits com 5 elizabeth smith k n i t s find me online website elizabethsmithknits com pattern support email me at info@elizabethsmithknits com sharing on social media make sure to tag me @elizabethsmithknits i love to see finished photos images and pattern © 2009 2019 2023 elizabeth smith knits/the brown stitch llc all rights reserved www elizabethsmithknits com 6
